Miles Sound System SDK 6.1c

AIL_set_3D_sample_offset

The function AIL_set_3D_sample_offset sets the playback offset of in a 3D sample.

void AIL_set_3D_sample_offset(
  H3DSAMPLE S,
  U32 offset
);

In Parameters

S
indicates the sample handle to position.
offset
is the offset in bytes at which to begin playback.


Group: 3D Digital Audio Services
Related Functions: AIL_3D_sample_offset
Related Basic Types: H3DSAMPLE, U32, void
